intro: This Product User Manual (PUM) provides comprehensive technical guidance for service providers engaged in producing standardised land use and land cover (LU/LC) maps within the Copernicus Urban Atlas programme. It encompasses mapping guidelines and class descriptions for the Urban Atlas product, focusing on the 2012 and 2018 reference years. The manual aims to ensure congruent product attributes, a common nomenclature, consistent visual representation, and comparable product quality across over 800 Functional Urban Areas (FUAs) spanning the EU, EFTA, Western Balkans, the UK, and Turkey.
